CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: molten slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: An alloy slug heated nearly to the melting point.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: high density slug
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A dense alloy slug heated nearly to the melting point. intended to defeat heavy armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: high-explosive dual purpose
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A rocket with an explosive casing around s shaped-charge core, useful against a variety of threats.
